description: The only child of Urashima Hinata`s eldest daughter, Urashima Yoko; her second daughter was Keitarou`s mother. After the death of Yoko, Hinata adopted her granddaughter. Therefore, Haruka is Keitarou`s legal aunt in addition to being his actual cousin. It was as a teenager that, while working at the inn, she was first called "Aunty Haruka" by her baby cousin Keitarou - the same time that Keitarou first met both Mutsumi and Naru.
name: Urashima Haruka
